text: The Guardians of Scotland were appointed to act as King during the two interregnums of 1290-1292 and 1296-1302. An interregum is a time when a monarchy has no king. It is from the Latin for "between reigns". Category:13th century in Scotland Category:Establishments in Scotland Category:14th-century disestablishments in Europe Category:1290s disestablishments Category:1300s disestablishments Category:1290s establishments in Europe
title: Guardians of Scotland
